alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 1:43PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Juab...west central Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 142 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southeast of Vernon, or 28 miles northwest of Nephi, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Tooele Army Depot South, Faust, Lofgreen and Tintic Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for central and northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
